content.question: int[][] points = {{11, 12, 13, 14, 15},{21, 22, 23, 24, 25},{31, 32, 33, 34, 35},{41, 42, 43, 44, 45}};for (int row = 0; row < points.length; row++){for (int col = points[0].length - 1; col >= row; col--){System.out.print(points[row][col] + " ");}System.out.println();}What is printed when this code segment is executed?

skill.text: 3.B: Determine the result or output based on code that contains data abstractions.
